cleaned_text: Read all about it! Papers, newsletters and perspectives NEWSLETTERS - A free training and event announcement calendar, issued via email every other month. [Subscribe HERE!](https://anthroposophicmedicine.us5.list-manage.com/subscribe?id=c4027c846e&u=17a133fc5ad8239b8b3ea39a5) - A comprehensive research-based newsletter featuring a broad selection of articles and authors across many different topics and fields related to medicine and Anthroposophic Medicine, issued via email four times a year. [Become a PAAM supporter!](https://anthroposophicmedicine.org/join-paam) - A free patient-oriented quarterly newsletter addressing many health-related topics such as self-care, diet and nutrition, home health care, child development, social health, sustainable farming, seasonal rhythms, and more.
